items.summary: Ensure the app presents a 5-page interactive flow with smooth animated transitions between pages in this exact order: Page 1 -> Page 2 -> Page 3 -> Page 4 -> Page 5. Pages 1â€“3 must each navigate via a visible â€œNextâ€ button; Page 4 must navigate to Page 5 only via clicking â€œYes ğŸŒ¹â€.

Set the siteâ€™s visual theme consistently across all pages: background color #20201F, accent color #EE6E4D, and a clean serif romantic font for all text. Buttons must be soft-rounded and use the accent color for fill with dark text.
Page 1 must display centered text exactly: "I'm really sorry chlow! ğŸ¤ŒğŸ»" and a clearly visible â€œNextâ€ button fixed/positioned at the bottom center of the viewport (not merely below the text).
Page 2 must display centered text exactly: "I want to hold u every time ğŸ« " and a clearly visible â€œNextâ€ button at the bottom center of the viewport.
Page 3 must show a short, heartfelt, romantic apology message (keep it concise), and a clearly visible â€œNextâ€ button at the bottom center of the viewport.
Page 4 must display centered text exactly: "Are you willing to forgive me, bab? â¤ï¸" and two buttons below it labeled exactly "Yes ğŸŒ¹" and "No ğŸ¥€". Clicking "Yes ğŸŒ¹" must navigate to Page 5.

Make the Page 4 "No ğŸ¥€" button playfully evade interaction by shifting position when hovered (mouse) or touched (touch devices), so it cannot be clicked easily while still remaining visible on screen.
Page 5 must display centered text exactly: "Awwwwweehh! Lvb u bab ğŸ’‹" and show exactly one cute cartoon couple-hugging GIF centered beneath the text. Page 5 must not show any â€œNextâ€ button.

Enforce the image sourcing rule: the app must not include any stock/external images. The Page 5 hugging GIF must be created/derived solely from the user-uploaded image file (8cea9dbe688448677b472a8d5e73118d-10.jpg) and stored as a static frontend asset under frontend/public/assets/generated, then referenced directly from the frontend.
